attributes.action: Suspend mortgages/rent and house hold Bill's if schools close and lockdown
attributes.additional_details: Because unless you have a stockpile of money no one will be able to afford rent and Bill's if having time off work and sick pay wont cut it and feed a family .this goes to All nhs workers too fire and police n ambulance
attributes.background: With hold people from having to pay mortgages a rent including house hold Bill's like Italy has so our country can recover with out debt or loss

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302256

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
